feed.title: sdm.ai
feed.subtitle: Here at sdm.ai we are working on the deep AI implications of Finnish Scientist Pentti Kanerva's Sparse Distributed Memory. All of our open-source activities are found here, such as a full computational framework for running SDM, multiple experiments in jupyter notebooks, full framework documentation, an ongoing open-source book, and much more.

entry.title: Welcome to Jekyll!
entry.content: Check out the Jekyll docs for more info on how to get the most out of Jekyll. File all bugs/feature requests at Jekyll’s GitHub repo. If you have questions, you can ask them on Jekyll Talk.
entry.summary: Check out the Jekyll docs for more info on how to get the most out of Jekyll. File all bugs/feature requests at Jekyll’s GitHub repo. If you have questions, you can ask them on Jekyll Talk.
